metadata.title: CVE-2014-9035 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Press This in WordPress before3.7.5, 3.8.x before 3.8.5, 3.9.x before 3.9.3, and 4.x before 4.0.1 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecifiedvectors.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
